__e: Oishi, I thought that this debauchery was due to the madness caused by the divorce from your wife, but all along you've been dreaming of taking Kira's head, haven't you ?
In his mind, avenging his master's death by killing Kira is not the ultimate goal.
Kira is not getting any younger.
I was humiliated by a cascade of insults directed my way by Lord Kira which completely exhausted my patience.
Kira and I love each other.
Kira is from chaturbate and she speaks english.
On the other hand, if you declare that Kira's behavior is acceptable, you are allowing cowardly samurai to roam the streets with their heads held high.
That said, Kira is the focus of our revenge.
Let's send Lord Kira to Yonezawa.
